sentences.en: It was a quiet, charming bistro on 56 th Street on the East side.
sentences.cn: 那家幽静可爱的餐馆坐落在市东区第五十六号大街上.

sentences.en: The new Bodum collection, BISTRO toaster in all shades of the rainbow.
sentences.cn: 新博达姆出售收集, 餐馆烤面包机在形形色色的彩虹.

sentences.en: We ate in the restaurant, as opposed to the bistro.
sentences.cn: 我们是在餐厅吃的饭，而不是在小饭馆。

sentences.en: We've tried to create the ambience of a French bistro.
sentences.cn: 我们想尽量创造出法国小餐馆的气氛.

sentences.en: Went to a nearby bistro for some drink.
sentences.cn: 吃完后到附近的酒吧坐坐.
